metadata.title: How to Enable YouTube Super Chat 2025: Live Stream Monetization
metadata.description: Set up Super Chat and Super Stickers. Monetize your YouTube live streams.

hero.headline: How to Enable YouTube Super Chat
hero.subheadline: Monetize live streams. Let viewers support you directly.

sections.content: Super Chat lets viewers pay to highlight their messages in your live stream chat. It's direct monetization during live interaction—viewers feel special, you earn revenue. Super Stickers add animated graphics to the mix. Here's how to set up and maximize these features.

sections.title: Enabling Super Chat
content: Be a YouTube Partner Program member
Super Chat now enabled for live streams

content.title: YPP Membership
content.description: Must be in YouTube Partner Program.

content.title: Available Country
content.description: Not all countries supported. Check eligibility.

content.title: No Strikes
content.description: Channel must be in good standing.

content.title: Super Chat
content.description: Highlighted message. $1-$500 range. Color by amount.

content.title: Super Thanks
content.description: Works on regular videos too. Not just live.

sections.title: Maximizing Super Chats
content: Acknowledge every Super Chat by name
Create special moments for top supporters
Set up alerts for Super Chats

faq.question: How much does YouTube take from Super Chats?
faq.answer: YouTube takes 30%, you keep 70%. This is after payment processing. Standard platform revenue share for direct supporter features.

faq.question: Minimum viewers for Super Chat?
faq.answer: No minimum viewers—if you're live and eligible, Super Chats are available. Even small streams can receive support from engaged community.

faq.question: Can I refund Super Chats?
faq.answer: Refunds are handled by YouTube support, not creators. Generally non-refundable except in specific circumstances. YouTube handles disputes.

faq.question: Super Chat vs memberships?
faq.answer: Super Chat: one-time during streams, visible to all. Memberships: recurring monthly, ongoing perks. Both valuable—Super Chat for engagement, memberships for stability.
